Text.Page:
Each of us has much to do, but supplies and equipment are thin on the ground.

We need dracoloth wings to trade in Elenea. Will you gather some for us?

Avoid Grigeltâ€”he's a force to be reckoned with. The others should be no match for your strength.
Our many thanks to you for going above and beyond your duty for the greater good.
We need those dracoloth wings if we are to trade them for much-needed supplies.
